apps.name: AnisFlix
apps.localizedDescription: AnisFlix est votre compagnon de streaming ultime. Regardez vos films, séries et chaînes TV préférés en haute qualité.

versions.localizedDescription: feat: switch to date-first sorting for latest episodes - Primary sort: by episode air date (newest first) - Secondary sort: by popularity (for same-day episodes) - Replaces hybrid popularity×freshness scoring - Verified locally: Landman (Jan 18) appears before Stranger Things (Dec 31)
